title: Alien Terror | Night of the Blood Beast (1958, Sci-Fi) by Roger Corman | Colorized Movie

sources.title: Alien Terror | Night of the Blood Beast (1958, Sci-Fi) by Roger Corman | Colorized Movie
sources.description:
No girl was safe as long as this head-hunting thing roamed the land!
During re-entry into Earth's atmosphere, an astronaut named Steve is killed, but his body is seeded with rapidly gestating extraterrestrial organisms. As the embryos begin to hatch, a full-grown alien being emerges. It then stalks and terrorizes the research team, absorbing knowledge from one of the scientists and communicating via his voice.

Original title: Night of the Blood Beast (1958) AKA: Monster from Galaxy 27
This film is subtitles in many languages.

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/6X0SIqNPjPE


Director: Bernard L. Kowalski
Writers: Gene Corman, Martin Varno 
Producer: Roger Corman
Stars: Michael Emmet, Angela Greene, John Baer, Ed Nelson 
Genres: Colorized classics, Cult Film, Horror, Sci-Fi, B-movie
Budget: $68,000


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
00:07 A space mission goes awry, leading to a fatal crash and a mysterious lack of body rigidity.
10:55  A team at a remote lab experiences communication and power issues, along with a mysterious creature attack.
17:59 Strange events unfold at a remote location, involving a mysterious blood sample and a magnetic field.
23:42 A space mission goes wrong, leading to mysterious events and a shocking discovery.
31:48 Close encounters with an alien creature that has taken over a man's body, leading to a debate on whether to destroy it or give it a chance to justify itself.
43:25 A group encounters a mysterious creature and debates its intentions and capabilities.
45:28 A team plans to communicate with a mysterious creature and prepares for a potential confrontation.
49:44 A mysterious creature uses a human body to communicate and seeks to offer a better way of life, despite suspicion and fear.
57:51 Alien warns of impending doom and offers a solution, but faces resistance and sacrifice.
